1.eng-name: The Book of Purification and its Sunnah

hadiths.text: It was narrated from Muhammed bin Al-Hanafiyyah that his father said:"The Messenger of Allah said: 'The key to prayer is purification, its opening is to say 'Allahu Akbar' and its closing is to say As-salamu 'alaikum

chapter.eng-name: The key to prayer is purification
